Today, 19th October is the day when the Japan - Soviet joint declaration was signed between Ichiro Hatoyama and Prime Minister of the Soviet Union Bruganin 56 years ago. My grandfather, who was also a voluntary US counterpart, placed a handicapped body and visited Moscow though the doctor told me that he might never step on the Japanese soil. At that time, as a member of the fraternity youth association party of the time (continued)

(Continued) "I am going to Moscow in the future, I have to live by many Japanese people who are detained in Siberia and have to step on the soil of my hometown, the territory will not run, but as long as the human life There is "I talked. At the same time I see the essence of my grandfather's fraternity spirit here, I feel a sense of politicians' preparedness at the same time.

(Continued) I would like to discuss the relationship between Japan and Russia, which can contribute to the stability and development of the world, by promoting the territorial issue, progressing the territorial issue, and contributing to the realization of both the people and the region, and President Putin .
